name: W59
label: GIP Wave 59
description:
[b[Allgemeine Hinweise für Datennutzer]b]
Der Datensatz der Welle 59 enthält folgende Kennungen und zugespielte Variablen:
• [i[id_g]i] - Unique ID, GIP
• [i[hhid_g]i] - Household Identifyer, GIP
• [i[pid]i] - Person identifyer (wthin HH)
• [i[gender_20]i] - gender
• [i[year_of_birth_cat_20]i] - year of birth categories
• [i[educ_school_21]i] - highest educational degree
• [i[educ_job_21]i]  - highest professional qualification
• [i[marital_status_21]i] - marital status
• [i[number_hh_members_21]i] - number of household members
• [i[occupation_21]i] - employment status
• [i[german_citizenship_21]i] - german citizenship
• [i[internet_usage_20]i] - private internet usage
• [i[state_21]i] - residence state
• [i[sample]i] - year of recruitment
• [i[dDatum]i] - Interview-Datum
• [i[online_status_wave]i] - current online status
